title: Full Metal Leona

embed.description: Phew finally managed to finish her >_< <- was unsure how to draw her armor, so I had a few tries until I was (quite) satisfied with it ^_^ original character: Leona from league of legends

body: Da Pantheon ja eigentlich schon einen Full-Metal Skin hat finde ich, dass man Leona auch einen geben könnte. Wie findet ihr ihn? :)
